name: Nosediver
description:
Steve is nosediving from his office, but you can help him! Guide Steve around to avoid crates and birds while also collecting pizzas and power-ups. Any pizzas that don't land on the roofs can be used to purchase new characters.

Includes:

- Very addicting building-falling simulation!

- Collectible pizzas!

- Different playable characters!

- One singular power-up!

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Explosion (when power-up has been gained)

Known Bugs

Player does not disappear on Game Over screen

No health bar

Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #22.
